TrainableDef.label: attack target
TrainableDef.description: Command the animal to attack a specific target that its master can see.

TrainableDef.label: comfort
TrainableDef.description: The animal will be more emotionally supportive. It will nuzzle more often, and make your colonists happier when it does so.

TrainableDef.label: forage
TrainableDef.description: The animal will occasionally find berries, mushrooms, or food. Animals will find more food in biomes with higher forageability. Foraging can only be done on fertile terrain.

TrainableDef.label: dig
TrainableDef.description: The animal will mine rock designated for mining. Animals are generally slow and inefficient at mining.

TrainableDef.label: egg spew
TrainableDef.description: Command the queen to launch an egg sac and a spray of acidic sludge at the target area. Once trained, the queen will only produce eggs when commanded.

TrainableDef.label: sludge spew
TrainableDef.description: Command the larva to spray an acidic sludge all over the target area. Once trained, larva will only spew sludge when commanded.

TrainableDef.label: terror roar
TrainableDef.description: Command the alpha thrumbo to release a deafening roar. This has a chance to send nearby hostile humans and animals fleeing in terror.

TrainableDef.label: war trumpet
TrainableDef.description: Command the animal to release a powerful roar. This has a chance to cause hostile humans and animals to tremble in fear, reducing their movement speed and manipulation.

TrainableDef.label: thrumbo roar
TrainableDef.description: Command the thrumbo to release a deafening roar. This has a chance to cause hostile humans and animals to tremble in fear, reducing their movement speed and manipulation.
